comment: Yes and yes I got my first vaccine Feb and I have my second vaccine appointment scheduled. I got the Moderna vaccine
amr:
# ::snt Yes and yes I got my first vaccine Feb and I have my second vaccine appointment scheduled. I got the Moderna vaccine
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (y / yes)
            :op2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                    :value 1)
                              :poss ii)
                        :time (d / date-entity
                              :month 2))
                  :op2 (s / schedule-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / appointment-02
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (v2 / vaccine
                                    :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                                          :value 2))))))
      :snt2 (g2 / get-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (v3 / vaccine
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Moderna"))))

comment: Have you gotten your vaccine yet? Are you over ?

                  :poss y)
            :time (y2 / yet))
